intro: GUNSPECTRE is a twin-stick adventure game featuring a large open world and a ton of action!
description:
GUNSPECTRE is a twin-stick adventure game featuring a large open world and a ton of action!

In the distant future, only a wasteland remains. An ancient menace has returned forcing many people to flee the once peaceful desert. Armed with a pocket full of of miracles, it is up to you to restore peace to the wasteland people call home. 

EXPLORE a desolate world and what lies beneath.

FIGHT your way through aggressive creatures and mysterious machines.

SURVIVE the menace from below, and bring peace back to the desert.
